text: Val-d'Aigoual is a commune in the Gard department in southern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Valleraugue (the seat) and Notre-Dame-de-la-Rouvière.Arrêté préfectoral 26 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Gard department ==References== Category:Communes of Gard Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Val-d'Aigoual
